price: Šta misliš o onome koji je svoju strast za boga svoga uzeo, onome kome je Allah, a on svjestan bio dao da je u zabludi, i sluh njegov, i srce njegovo zapečatio, a pred oči njegove koprenu stavio? Ko će ga, ako neće Allah, na Pravi put uputiti? Zašto se ne prisjetite?
arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٖ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِۦ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَجَعَلَ عَلَىٰ بَصَرِهِۦ غِشَٰوَةٗ فَمَن يَهۡدِيهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: afara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilāhahu hawāhu wa-aḍallahu al-lahu ʿalā ʿil'min wakhatama ʿalā samʿihi waqalbihi wajaʿala ʿalā baṣarihi ghishāwatan faman yahdīhi min baʿdi al-lahi afalā tadhakkarūna
translations: and Allah lets him go astray
and Allah lets him go astray
